titleStmt.title: Samuel G. Suddarth, Receipt to Isaac W. Scott
CWG13666

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.idno: QMG Box 11; Bundles of AG & QMG Expenditures 1864-65; Bundle 1

body.p:
No. 22.
THE STATE OF KENTUCKY,
To Isaac W Scott Dr

row.cell: To Salary as Surgeon General of Kentucky for Six Months beginning July 1 1864 and ending Decr 31 1864. 6 mos at $150 per month=

body.p: The Quarter Master General will pay the above claim amounting to Nine hundred dollars from the Military Fund

Thos E Bramlette
Govr of Ky
I Certify that the above account is correct and just; that the services were rendered as stated; and that they were necessary for the public service.

Received at Frankfort, Kentucky, the 21 of Decr, 1864, of S. G. SUDDARTH, Quarter-Master General of Kentucky Volunteers, the sum of nine hundred Dollars and -- Cents, in full of the above account.
(DUPLICATE.)

Sett, No 8
No. 22.
No 43 Abstract B No 3 Qr. 186
I W Scott
Dollars 900 00/100
Paid Decr 21, 1864.
Salary
Certif No 750
